name: io/http/utils/Single param appender
description:
Appends a single query parameter received via `key` and `value` to the array of single query params received via `params` (input), and sends the result via `params` (output).

Example:
1. "Sally"@1 received via `value`
2. "name"@1 received via `key`
3. []@1 received via `params`
4. [{"key": "name", "value": "Sally"}]@1 sent via `params` (output)

6e228fb0-0fde-4516-a952-b62f9dd01a9a.name: value
6e228fb0-0fde-4516-a952-b62f9dd01a9a.description: Receives a single query parameter value.

190f88ba-b553-4e6b-a939-f83424e61e67.name: key
190f88ba-b553-4e6b-a939-f83424e61e67.description: Receives the key part of a key-value pair.

206684ff-0207-4f9b-8dae-8eec635ec404.name: params
206684ff-0207-4f9b-8dae-8eec635ec404.description: Receives an array of single query params as key-value pairs.

f1f1b34b-5cc6-46b5-818b-db0e8de08b7a.name: params
f1f1b34b-5cc6-46b5-818b-db0e8de08b7a.description: Sends an array of single query params as key-value pairs.
